src:
Paša za oči: Angelina Jolie pri 44 letih pozirala gola
Na naslovnici revije Harper‘s Bazaar je še kar razgaljena.
06 Nov 2019, 16:10 by T. K.
Angelina Jolie (44) je na instagramu objavila nekaj fotografij, posnetih za Harper's Bazaar. Na eni izmed njih je le v modrčku in spodnjih hlačkah.



V intervjuju za to revijo je dejala, da je divja in nemirna, priznala pa je, da zaradi preteklih dogodkov nosi vidne in nevidne brazgotine. »Težje je nositi tiste nevidne. Življenje se vseskozi spreminja. Včasih trpiš sam, včasih gledaš, kako trpijo tisti, ki jih ljubiš, zato ne moreš biti tako svoboden, kot si tvoje bitje želi. Zdaj čutim, da se kri vrača v moje telo,« je med drugim zafilozofirala.
text:
Eye Grazing: Angelina Jolie posed naked at 44 years old
The cover of Harper¡s Bazaar is still bare.
06 Nov 2019, 15:10 by T.K.
Angelina Jolie, 44, posted on Instagram some photos taken for Harper's Bazaar. Only one of them is in a bra and panties.



In an interview with this magazine, she said she was wild and restless, and admitted that she has visible and invisible scars due to past events. “It's harder to wear the invisible ones. Life is changing all the time. Sometimes you suffer alone, sometimes you watch the ones you love suffer, so you can't be as free as your being wants. Now I feel blood returning to my body, ”she philosophized, among other things.
